57729.ja: <voice 00272_00057729><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ゲホッ……ゴホッ　ゴホッ！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57729.ko: <voice 00272_00057729><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 쿨럭…… 콜록콜록!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57730.en:
<voice 00475_00057730><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>. Thank you so much for your help
the other day!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57730.ja:
<voice 00475_00057730><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ　<pc>さん。
　先日は　助けていただいたみたいで
　ありがとうございました。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57730.ko:
<voice 00475_00057730><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어머, <pc> 씨.
　지난번에는 구해 주셔서
　감사했어요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57730.zh-Hans:
<voice 00475_00057730><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>。
前几天是你救了我吧，
谢谢你。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57730.zh-Hant:
<voice 00475_00057730><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎呀，<pc>，
前些日子受到你的幫助了，
謝謝你。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57731.en:
<voice 00580_00057731><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I never would've expected the Hero Zankrone to
actually appear before me. I was so surprised that I
couldn't help but faint.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57731.ja:
<voice 00580_00057731><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まさか　英雄ザンクローネさんが　本当にいて
　私の前に現れるなんて　おどろきのあまり
　目を回してしまったんです。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57731.ko:
<voice 00580_00057731><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 설마 영웅 장크로네 씨가 진짜로 있고
　제 앞에 나타나다니 너무 놀란 나머지
　정신을 잃고 말았답니다.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57731.zh-Hans:
<voice 00580_00057731><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>没想到英雄赞库罗尼真的会
出现在我眼前，
我太吃惊，一下子就晕倒了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57731.zh-Hant:
<voice 00580_00057731><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>沒想到英雄桑克朗真的存在，
還出現在我的面前，
真是太令人驚訝了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57732.en:
<voice 00695_00057732><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>But he's nothing like the gentleman of my grandfather's
fairy tales...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57732.ja:
<voice 00695_00057732><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「だけど　あの方ったら
　おじいさまの童話とは違って……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57732.ko:
<voice 00695_00057732><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그런데 그분은
　할아버님의 동화와는 다르게……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57732.zh-Hans:
<voice 00695_00057732><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>但是，那个人和
爷爷的童话里不一样……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57732.zh-Hant:
<voice 00695_00057732><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>不過，那位
一定和爺爺的童話不一樣……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57733.en: <voice 00795_00057733><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>You called me?<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57733.ja: <voice 00795_00057733><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「俺を　呼んだか？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57733.ko: <voice 00795_00057733><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 날 불렀나?<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57733.zh-Hant: <voice 00795_00057733><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你叫我嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57735.en:
<voice 01080_00057735><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh, Zankrone, you've been secretly eating my bread
again, haven't you.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57735.ja:
<voice 01080_00057735><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ　ザンクローネさん。
　うちのパンを　また　つまみぐいしましたね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57735.ko:
<voice 01080_00057735><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어머, 장크로네 씨.
　우리 집 빵을 또 몰래 드셨군요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57735.zh-Hans:
<voice 01080_00057735><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>真是的，赞库罗尼。
你又偷吃我家的面包了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57735.zh-Hant:
<voice 01080_00057735><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎呀，是桑克朗先生。
你又偷吃我做的麵包了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57736.en: <voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I didn't scarf nothing. It was a taste test, just a taste test.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57736.fr:
<voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>J'mangeai pas en cachette. C'était un goûter, juste
un goûter.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57736.ja:
<voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「つまみぐいじゃねえぞ。
　味見だよ　味見。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57736.ko:
<voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 몰래 먹은 게 아니지.
　맛만 본 거야, 맛만.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57736.zh-Hans:
<voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我不是偷吃。
是尝味道，尝味道。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57736.zh-Hant:
<voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我才沒偷吃呢。
這是試吃，是測試味道。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57737.en:
<voice 01330_00057737><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Sure... If only you were as gentlemanly as the Zankrone
in the fairy tales.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57737.ja:
<voice 01330_00057737><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「はぁ……。
　童話の中の　ザンクローネさんは
　もっと　紳士的でしたのに。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57737.ko:
<voice 01330_00057737><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 하아…….
　동화 속 장크로네 씨는
　더 신사적이었는데.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57737.zh-Hans:
<voice 01330_00057737><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>唉……
童话中的赞库罗尼
明明更加绅士的。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57737.zh-Hant:
<voice 01330_00057737><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>唉……
明明童話裡的桑克朗先生
還更紳士一點呢。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57738.en:
<voice 01415_00057738><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Don't be such a narrow minded girl. You'll never make a
name for yourself with that attitude!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57738.ja:
<voice 01415_00057738><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「心の　せめえ　嬢ちゃんだぜ。
　そんなんじゃ　将来　大物になれねえぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57738.ko:
<voice 01415_00057738><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 별 속 좁은 아가씨를 다 보겠네.
　그래서야 나중에 큰사람이 될 수 있겠나!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57738.zh-Hans:
<voice 01415_00057738><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>真是个小心眼的小姑娘，
你这样子以后可成不了大人物！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57738.zh-Hant:
<voice 01415_00057738><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>還真是個心胸狹窄的小姑娘。
這樣下去，妳將來可成不了氣候！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57739.en: <voice 01700_00057739><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>...This village is peaceful, right.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57739.ja: <voice 01700_00057739><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「……この村は　平和だな。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57739.ko: <voice 01700_00057739><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: ……이 마을은 참 평화롭군.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57739.zh-Hans: <voice 01700_00057739><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……这个村子真和平啊。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57739.zh-Hant: <voice 01700_00057739><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……這個村莊還真和平。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57740.en:
<voice 01780_00057740><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>. Seems like I've come to a different
Melsandy Village than the one I know.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57740.ja:
<voice 01780_00057740><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「なあ　<pc>。どうやら　俺は
　俺の知ってる　メルサンディ村とは
　別のメルサンディ村に　来ちまったらしい。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57740.ko:
<voice 01780_00057740><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 이봐, <pc>. 아무래도 난
　내가 아는 메르상디 마을이 아닌
　다른 메르상디 마을에 온 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57740.zh-Hans:
<voice 01780_00057740><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><pc>。看样子我来到的这个
梅尔桑蒂村并不是我知道的
那个梅尔桑蒂村。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57740.zh-Hant:
<voice 01780_00057740><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>欸，<pc>，看來這裡
不是我所熟知的梅爾桑蒂村，
而是另一個梅爾桑蒂村。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57741.en:
<voice 01830_00057741><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I've been called a hero for a long time, but this is a first,
I've got no idea what's happening.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57741.ja:
<voice 01830_00057741><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「英雄と呼ばれて　永く生きていたが
　こんな　わけわかんねえこと　はじめてだ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57741.ko:
<voice 01830_00057741><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 영웅이라 불리며 오랜 세월을 살았지만
　이렇게 영문 모를 일은 처음이야.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57741.zh-Hans:
<voice 01830_00057741><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我被称为英雄，已经活了很久了，
但还是头一次遇到这么莫名其妙的事。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57741.zh-Hant:
<voice 01830_00057741><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>雖然我被稱作英雄而且長生不老，
但我還是第一次遇到這麼奇怪的事。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57742.en:
<voice 02000_00057742><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I gotta make this kind of scene for the people in the
other village. So I need to find a way back, you know.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57742.ja:
<voice 02000_00057742><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「むこうの村のヤツらにも 
　こんな風景を見せてやらなきゃな。
　そのためには　帰る手段を見つけねえと。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57742.ko:
<voice 02000_00057742><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 저쪽 마을 녀석들에게도
　이런 풍경을 보여 줘야지.
　그러려면 돌아갈 수단을 찾아야 해.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57742.zh-Hans:
<voice 02000_00057742><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>一定要让另一个梅尔桑蒂村的人们
也过上这样和平的日子啊。
所以我一定要找到回去的方法。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57742.zh-Hant:
<voice 02000_00057742><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我也必須讓我們村裡的傢伙們
過上這樣和平的日子啊。
所以我得想辦法回去才行。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57743.ja: <voice 02090_00057743><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネさん……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57743.ko: <voice 02090_00057743><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 장크로네 씨…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57743.zh-Hans: <voice 02090_00057743><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57743.zh-Hant: <voice 02090_00057743><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>桑克朗先生……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57744.en:
<voice 02150_00057744><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>First, I'm gonna look for those rascally rabbits that lured
me here. They might know what's wrong, right.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57744.ja:
<voice 02150_00057744><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「まずは　俺を　こっちに誘い込んだ
　いたずらウサギどもを　探すぜ。
　なんか事情を知ってるに　違いねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57744.ko:
<voice 02150_00057744><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 우선 날 이쪽으로 유인한
　개구쟁이 토끼들을 찾아야겠어.
　뭔가 사정을 알고 있는 게 틀림없다.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57744.zh-Hans:
<voice 02150_00057744><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我要先找到把我引到这里的
恶作剧兔子。
它们一定知道点什么。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57744.zh-Hant:
<voice 02150_00057744><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我要先去找那些
引誘我過來的兔子們。
牠們一定知道些什麼。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57745.en:
<voice 02280_00057745><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I'll find 'em, catch 'em, and force it out of 'em! Say...
What kind of stuff do rabbits like, anyway?<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57745.ja:
<voice 02280_00057745><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「見つけて　とっちめて 
　むこうに帰る方法を　はかせる。
　……なあ　ウサギの好物を　知ってるか？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57745.ko:
<voice 02280_00057745><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 찾아서 혼쭐을 내고
　그곳으로 돌아갈 방법을 털어놓게 해야지.
　……이봐, 토끼가 뭘 좋아하는지 알아?<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57745.zh-Hans:
<voice 02280_00057745><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我要把它们找出来好好收拾一顿，
让它们说出回去的方法。
……喂，你知道兔子喜欢什么吗？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57745.zh-Hant:
<voice 02280_00057745><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我要找到牠們，
逼牠們說出回去的方法。
……妳知道兔子喜歡什麼嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57746.en: <voice 02450_00057746><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Rabbits like... Carrots, don't they?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57746.ja: <voice 02450_00057746><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ウサギといったら……ニンジンでしょうか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57746.ko: <voice 02450_00057746><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 토끼라면…… 당근 아닐까요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57746.zh-Hans: <voice 02450_00057746><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>兔子的话，应该是喜欢胡萝卜的吧？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57746.zh-Hant: <voice 02450_00057746><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>說到兔子……就是紅蘿蔔吧？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57747.en:
<voice 02512_00057747><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>You're totally hopeless. Everybody knows that it's jam
and butter!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57747.ja:
<voice 02512_00057747><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「お前は　てんでダメだな。
　ジャムとバターに　決まってんだろ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57747.ko:
<voice 02512_00057747><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 정말 한심한 아가씨네.
　당연히 잼과 버터잖아!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57747.zh-Hans:
<voice 02512_00057747><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你根本不行啊。
兔子肯定是喜欢果酱和黄油的！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57747.zh-Hant:
<voice 02512_00057747><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>妳這樣不行啊。
當然是果醬和奶油才對！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57748.en:
<voice 02675_00057748><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>We can use those two as a trap to lure them out of
Rabbani Hole. <pc>, I'll need your help for this!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57748.ja:
<voice 02675_00057748><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「その　ふたつを罠に使って
　ヤツらを　ラバニの穴に　おびきだす。
　<pc>　協力を頼むぜ！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57748.ko:
<voice 02675_00057748><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 그 2가지를 미끼로 써서
　놈들을 라바니 구덩이로 유인하겠어.
　<pc>, 날 도와 다오!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57748.zh-Hans:
<voice 02675_00057748><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>用这两样东西制造一个陷阱，
再把它们引到拉巴尼洞穴。
<pc>，拜托你给我帮个忙。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57748.zh-Hant:
<voice 02675_00057748><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>把這兩樣東西放在陷阱裡，
引誘牠們過來黑兔洞穴。
<pc>，拜託你幫忙了！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57749.en:
<voice 02755_00057749><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Gather some jam and butter, and then meet me inside
Rabbani Hole in Sunbeam Square.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57749.ja:
<voice 02755_00057749><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「ジャムとバターをそろえて　こもれびの広場の
　ラバニの穴の奥まで来てくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57749.ko:
<voice 02755_00057749><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 잼과 버터를 모아서 햇살 광장의
　라바니 구덩이 안쪽으로 와 줘.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57749.zh-Hans:
<voice 02755_00057749><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>带上果酱和黄油
到林荫广场的拉巴尼洞穴深处来。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57749.zh-Hant:
<voice 02755_00057749><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>請你去林隙日光廣場的黑兔洞穴深處，
蒐集果醬和奶油回來。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57750.en:
<voice 02835_00057750><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>We'll leave the jam and butter there, then hide until
the rabbits are drawn out by the smell of their favorite
foods.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57750.ja:
<voice 02835_00057750><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「そこに　ジャムとバターを置いておいて
　ウサギどもが　好物の匂いにつられて 
　現れるまで　身を隠しておけば　いいのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57750.ko:
<voice 02835_00057750><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 그곳에 잼과 버터를 놓고
　토끼들이 그 냄새에 이끌려
　나타날 때까지 몸을 숨기고 기다리면 돼.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57750.zh-Hans:
<voice 02835_00057750><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>把果酱和黄油放在那里，
然后藏起来，
等着兔子们被引出来就行了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57750.zh-Hant:
<voice 02835_00057750><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>將果醬和奶油放在那裡，
兔子們就會聞香而來，
在那之前我們只要躲好看著就可以了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87304.en: <voice 02930_00087304><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Well, I'll leave it to you, partner!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87304.ja: <voice 02930_00087304><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「そんじゃ　頼んだぜ　相棒！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87304.ko: <voice 02930_00087304><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 부탁한다, 파트너!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87304.zh-Hans: <voice 02930_00087304><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>那就拜托你了啊，搭档！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87304.zh-Hant: <voice 02930_00087304><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>那就拜託你了啊，搭檔！<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57751.en:
<voice 03080_00057751><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>How can someone that small wander into an unknown
world, and be so positive, I wonder...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57751.ja:
<voice 03080_00057751><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「あんな　小さな姿で
　見知らぬ世界に　迷い込んでしまって
　どうして　前向きでいられるのかしら……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57751.ko:
<voice 03080_00057751><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 저렇게 작은 모습으로
　낯선 세계에 길을 잃고 들어왔는데
　어쩜 저렇게 낙천적일 수 있는지…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57751.zh-Hans:
<voice 03080_00057751><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>他明明个子那么小，
为什么在误入陌生的世界后，
还能那么乐观呢……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57751.zh-Hant:
<voice 03080_00057751><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>他的身體那麼小，還誤入了未知的世界，
為什麼還能那麼樂觀呢……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57752.en:
<voice 03190_00057752><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001><pc>, can you please help Zankrone by finding
some jam and butter?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57752.ja:
<voice 03190_00057752><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん　お願いです。
　ジャムとバターを探して　ザンクローネさんの
　チカラになってあげてくれませんか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57752.ko:
<voice 03190_00057752><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 저도 부탁드려요.
　잼과 버터를 찾아서 장크로네 씨에게
　힘이 되어 주시지 않겠어요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57752.zh-Hans:
<voice 03190_00057752><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001><pc>，拜托你了。
去找到果酱和黄油，
帮赞库罗尼一把吧？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57752.zh-Hant:
<voice 03190_00057752><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>拜託你了，<pc>。
你能去尋找果醬和奶油，
助桑克朗先生一臂之力嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000819.en:
<voice 03320_29000819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Thank you very much. <pc>, you're just as
kind as the traveler in the fairy tale.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000819.ja:
<voice 03320_29000819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございます。
　<pc>さんの　そういう親切なところ
　童話の中の旅人さんに　そっくりですね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000819.ko:
<voice 03320_29000819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다.
　<pc> 씨의 그런 친절한 면은
　동화 속 여행자님과 정말 똑같네요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000819.zh-Hans:
<voice 03320_29000819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>谢谢你。
<pc>待人亲切这点
跟童话中的旅行者一模一样。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000819.zh-Hant:
<voice 03320_29000819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>謝謝你。
<pc>這種親切的地方，
跟童話中的旅人一模一樣。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000026.en: <voice 03321_29000026><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Well, we still have business with those rabbits.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000026.ja:
<voice 03321_29000026><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「まぁ　あのウサギどもには
　オレたちも　用があるしな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000026.ko:
<voice 03321_29000026><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 그 토끼들한테는
　우리도 볼일이 있으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000026.zh-Hans:
<voice 03321_29000026><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>毕竟我们也有事
要找那两只兔子。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000026.zh-Hant:
<voice 03321_29000026><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>畢竟我們也有事
要找那兩隻兔子。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000027.en:
<voice 03322_29000027><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Since Zankrone doesn't seem to know anything, we have
no one else but the bunnies to ask.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000027.ja:
<voice 03322_29000027><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネさんは　何も知らないようですし
　こうなったら　ウサギたちに
　問いただすしか　ありませんね。　<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000027.ko:
<voice 03322_29000027><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 장크로네 씨는 아무것도 모르는 눈치였으니
　이렇게 되면 토끼들에게
　물어보는 수밖에 없겠어요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000027.zh-Hans:
<voice 03322_29000027><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>赞库罗尼先生似乎什么都不知道，
这样一来我们就只能去跟
那两只兔子问个清楚了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000027.zh-Hant:
<voice 03322_29000027><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>桑克朗先生似乎什麼都不知道，
這樣一來我們就只能去跟那兩隻兔子
問個清楚了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

29000028.en:
<voice 03400_29000028><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Jam and butter... Is that so. Hanne at the farm knows
about jam, and Riyon at the pub is familiar with
butter.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000028.ja:
<voice 03400_29000028><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ジャムとバターは……そうですね。
　ジャムのことは　畑にいるハンネさんが
　バターは　酒場のリヨンさんが　くわしいです。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000028.ko:
<voice 03400_29000028><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 잼과 버터는…… 그렇지.
　잼은 밭에 있는 한네 씨가
　버터는 주점의 리용 씨가 잘 알 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000028.zh-Hans:
<voice 03400_29000028><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>果酱和黄油……我想想哦，
果酱要问田里的翰妮，
黄油的话要去问酒馆的莉尤，这些她们比较熟。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000028.zh-Hant:
<voice 03400_29000028><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>果醬和奶油……我想想喔，
果醬要問田裡的翰妮，
奶油的話要去問酒館的莉詠，這些她們比較熟。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57755.en:
<voice 03555_00057755><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I can't do much myself, but... If you have any
questions, please feel free to ask me.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57755.ja:
<voice 03555_00057755><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私が　直接　お手伝いするのは 
　むずかしいのですけれど……
　困ったら　なんでも　お聞きください。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57755.ko:
<voice 03555_00057755><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 제가 직접 도와 드리기는
　힘들겠지만……
　난처하실 때는 뭐든지 물어보세요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57755.zh-Hans:
<voice 03555_00057755><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我虽然无法直接帮你，
但是你有任何不清楚的事，
都可以来问我。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57755.zh-Hant:
<voice 03555_00057755><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我可能很難直接幫忙……
但如果你遇上什麼困擾，
請儘管和我說。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57756.en:
<voice 03595_00057756><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Well... <pc>, I do appreciate the gesture,
but it seems you too many requests as it is.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57756.ja:
<voice 03595_00057756><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ……<pc>さん。
　お気持ちは　とってもありがたいのですが
　ご依頼を　受けすぎみたいですね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57756.ko:
<voice 03595_00057756><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어머…… <pc> 씨.
　마음은 정말 감사하지만
　의뢰를 너무 많이 받으셨나 봐요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57756.zh-Hans:
<voice 03595_00057756><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊……<pc>。
你有这份心意我非常地感动，
但是看样子你接受的委托已经很多了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57756.zh-Hant:
<voice 03595_00057756><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>哎呀，<pc>。
你的心意我心領了，
但你好像已經有很多委託在身了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57757.en:
<voice 03700_00057757><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Given that, I'll be in my room, so please come back
when you've freed up your schedule.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57757.ja:
<voice 03700_00057757><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私は　お部屋におりますので 
　手が空いたら　どうか　私のお願い
　頼まれてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57757.ko:
<voice 03700_00057757><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 저는 방에 있을 테니
　여유가 생기시면 부디 제 부탁을
　받아 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57757.zh-Hans:
<voice 03700_00057757><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我就在房间里，
等你有空的时候，
再来完成我的委托吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57757.zh-Hant:
<voice 03700_00057757><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我就在房間裡，
如果你有空了，
請一定要聽聽我的請託。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57758.en: <voice 03835_00057758><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I see... I suppose you're busy too, right, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57758.ja:
<voice 03835_00057758><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ……。
　<pc>さんも　お忙しいのですね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57758.ko:
<voice 03835_00057758><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 저런…….
　<pc> 씨도 바쁘신가 보군요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57758.zh-Hans:
<voice 03835_00057758><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊……
<pc>也有很多事要做啊。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57758.zh-Hant:
<voice 03835_00057758><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>嗯……
<pc>也很忙嘛。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57759.en:
<voice 03940_00057759><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Given that, I'll be in my room, so please come back
when you've freed up your schedule.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57759.ja:
<voice 03940_00057759><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私は　お部屋におりますので 
　手が空いたら　どうか　私のお願い
　頼まれてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57759.ko:
<voice 03940_00057759><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 저는 방에 있을 테니
　여유가 생기시면 부디 제 부탁을
　받아 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57759.zh-Hans:
<voice 03940_00057759><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我就在房间里，
等你有空的时候，
再来完成我的委托吧。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57759.zh-Hant:
<voice 03940_00057759><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我就在房間裡，
如果你有空了，

57760.en:
<cs_pchero> puts down the Deep Red Jam and the
Snow White Butter, then hides.
57760.ja:
<cs_pchero>は　くれないジャムと
しらゆきバターを置き　身を隠した。
57760.ko:
{cs_pchero}|hpp(은,는) 주홍색 잼과
백설 버터를 놓고 몸을 숨겼다.
57760.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>放下了鲜红果酱和
白雪黄油，藏了起来。
57760.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>將鮮紅果醬
和白雪奶油放下，並躲在附近。

57761.ja: そして　しばらく　時が流れた……。

57762.en:
<voice 00570_00057762><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>...*Sniff-sniff* *sniff* I can't get enough of that smell,
right, Berti!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57762.ja:
<voice 00570_00057762><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>「……フンフン　フン。
　たまらない　においねぇ　バーティ！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57762.ko:
<voice 00570_00057762><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>: ……킁킁킁.
　끝내주는 냄새야, 버티!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57762.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00057762><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>……闻闻闻。
这个味道可真让人受不了啊，巴迪！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57762.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00057762><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>……聞聞聞。
真是令人受不了的味道啊，巴迪！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57763.en: <voice 00760_00057763><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>...*Sniff-sniff* *sniff* I'm drooling, Jamii!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57763.ja:
<voice 00760_00057763><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>「……フンフン　フン。
　よだれが出ちゃうわ～　ジャーミィ！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57763.ko:
<voice 00760_00057763><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>: ……킁킁킁.
　군침이 도는걸~ 재미!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57763.zh-Hans:
<voice 00760_00057763><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>……闻闻闻。
我的口水都要流出来了，伽密！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57763.zh-Hant:
<voice 00760_00057763><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>……聞聞聞。
口水都要流下來了～～伽密！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57764.en: <voice 01215_00057764><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>OH YEAH, JAM!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57764.ja: <voice 01215_00057764><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>「おややん　ジャムよぉ！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57764.ko: <voice 01215_00057764><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>: 뭐야야? 잼이잖아!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57764.zh-Hans: <voice 01215_00057764><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>哦呀呀，是果酱啊！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57764.zh-Hant: <voice 01215_00057764><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，是果醬！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57765.ja: <voice 01275_00057765><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>「あららん　バターよ～！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57765.ko: <voice 01275_00057765><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>: 어머머! 버터네~!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57765.zh-Hans: <voice 01275_00057765><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>啊啦啦，是黄油啊！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57765.zh-Hant: <voice 01275_00057765><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，是奶油～～！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57766.en: <voice 01335_00057766><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>Augh! This jar lid is tooough.<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57767.en:
<voice 01385_00057767><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>It hopeless, isn't iiit, it really is saaad. That's it,

57767.zh-Hant:

<voice 01599_00057770><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>We're innocent, we won't forgive you for messing with

<voice 00517_00057787><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Hey... The little bunnies we wanted to meet. Why did

57789.en: <voice 00597_00057789><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>We don't know anything!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57789.ja: <voice 00597_00057789><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>「あたしたち　なんにも　知らないんだからぁ！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57789.ko: <voice 00597_00057789><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>: 우린 아무것도 모른단 말이야!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57789.zh-Hans: <voice 00597_00057789><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>我们可什么都不知道！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57789.zh-Hant: <voice 00597_00057789><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>我們什麼都不知道！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57790.en:
<voice 00647_00057790><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Keep it up and I'll tear off your ears. The way to
return to my original world... Tell me how to do it.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57790.ja:
<voice 00647_00057790><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「ふざけてると　耳が飛ぶぜ。
　元の世界に　戻る方法……教えてもらおうか。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57790.ko:
<voice 00647_00057790><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 자꾸 까불면 귀를 날려 버리겠어.
　원래 세계로 돌아갈 방법…… 순순히 털어놔.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57790.zh-Hans:
<voice 00647_00057790><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>如果你们继续装疯卖傻，耳朵就要飞走了哦。
快点告诉我……回到原来世界的方法。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57790.zh-Hant:
<voice 00647_00057790><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>再跟我開玩笑，我就把你的耳朵打飛。
你可以告訴我回到原來的世界的方法嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57791.en: <voice 00717_00057791><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>Heehee. You can't go back anymore.<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57791.ja: <voice 00717_00057791><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>「うふふ。もう　戻れないわぁ。<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57791.ko: <voice 00717_00057791><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>: 우후후. 이제 못 돌아가.<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57791.zh-Hans: <voice 00717_00057791><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>呵呵，你已经回不去了。<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57791.zh-Hant: <voice 00717_00057791><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>呵呵，已經回不去了。<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57792.en: <voice 00772_00057792><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>Heehee. With the eternal night, comes the wiiitch!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57792.ja:
<voice 00772_00057792><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>「うふふ。永遠の夜とともに
　魔女様が　いらっしゃるもの～。<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57792.ko:
<voice 00772_00057792><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>: 우후후. 영원한 밤과 함께
　마녀님이 오시는걸~<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57792.zh-Hans:
<voice 00772_00057792><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>呵呵，因为魔女大人和
永远的黑夜同在～<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57792.zh-Hant:
<voice 00772_00057792><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>呵呵，永遠的黑夜
和魔女大人都已經來了～～<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57794.en:
<voice 00922_00057794><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>And then Melsandy Village is done for! And so are you,
Zankrone!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57794.ja:
<voice 00922_00057794><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>「そして　メルサンディ村は　滅んじゃうの！
　ザンクローネ　あなたとともにねぇ！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57794.ko:
<voice 00922_00057794><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>: 그리고 메르상디 마을은 멸망할 거야!
　장크로네, 당신과 함께 말이야!<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57794.zh-Hans:
<voice 00922_00057794><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>而且，梅尔桑蒂村就要毁灭了！
和赞库罗尼你一起！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57794.zh-Hant:
<voice 00922_00057794><start_lip_sync m12004 _normal m00001>梅爾桑蒂村也將被毀滅！
你也會一起陪葬，桑克朗！<stop_lip_animation m12004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57795.en:
<voice 00962_00057795><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>Heroes are even more worthless than crust on bread!
How saaad!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57795.ja:
<voice 00962_00057795><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>「パンの耳より　役に立たない英雄って
　アワレだわ～！　ミジメだわ～！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57795.ko:
<voice 00962_00057795><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>: 빵 귀퉁이보다 쓸모없는 영웅이라니
　딱해~! 한심해~!<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57795.zh-Hans:
<voice 00962_00057795><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>你这个英雄真是比面包边还派不上用场！
真可怜～真丢人～<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57795.zh-Hant:
<voice 00962_00057795><start_lip_sync m12005 _normal m00001>比吐司邊更沒用的英雄，
真是可悲～～真是淒慘啊～～！<stop_lip_animation m12005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57796.en: <voice 01467_00057796><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>The witch's back... Huh.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57796.ja: <voice 01467_00057796><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「魔女が現れる……ね。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57796.ko: <voice 01467_00057796><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 마녀가 나타난다……는 말이지?<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57796.zh-Hans: <voice 01467_00057796><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>魔女要出现了……啊。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57796.zh-Hant: <voice 01467_00057796><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>魔女現身了嗎……<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57797.en: <voice 01572_00057797><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, there's something I want to tell you.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57797.ja:
<voice 01572_00057797><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　お前に
　聞いてほしいことがあるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57797.ko:
<voice 01572_00057797><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 너에게
　할 말이 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57797.zh-Hans:
<voice 01572_00057797><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，
有件事，希望你能听我说。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57797.zh-Hant:
<voice 01572_00057797><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，
我想跟你說件事。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57798.en: <voice 01602_00057798><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Those rabbits we just buried. They were...<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57798.ja:
<voice 01602_00057798><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「さっき　葬ったウサギどもな。
　あいつらは……<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57798.ko:
<voice 01602_00057798><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 방금 없애 버린 토끼들 말이야.
　그 녀석들은……<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57798.zh-Hans:
<voice 01602_00057798><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>刚才干掉的那两只兔子，
它们是……<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57798.zh-Hant:
<voice 01602_00057798><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>剛才打倒的那兩隻兔子。
牠們是……<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57799.en: <voice 01692_00057799><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>They were my ears.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57799.ja: <voice 01692_00057799><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「俺の耳なんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57799.ko: <voice 01692_00057799><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 내 귀야.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57799.zh-Hans: <voice 01692_00057799><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我的耳朵。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57799.zh-Hant: <voice 01692_00057799><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我的耳朵。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57800.en:
<voice 01722_00057800><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Those hand monsters you came across before, they were
originally my left and right hands.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57800.ja:
<voice 01722_00057800><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「お前が　以前出会った　手の化け物は
　元は　俺の右手と左手だ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57800.ko:
<voice 01722_00057800><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 네가 전에 마주친 손 괴물은
　사실 내 오른손과 왼손이지.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57800.zh-Hans:
<voice 01722_00057800><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你以前遇上的手形怪物，
那是我的右手和左手。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57800.zh-Hant:
<voice 01722_00057800><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你以前遇見的手形怪物，
那原本是我的右手和左手。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57801.en:
<voice 01792_00057801><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Because of the witch's cursed on me, my true body was
split apart. My head, ears, limbs, torso, and heart...<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57801.ja:
<voice 01792_00057801><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「俺は　ある魔女の呪いによって
　本当の身体を　バラバラにされた。
　頭に　耳　手足　胴体　心臓……。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57801.ko:
<voice 01792_00057801><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 나는 어떤 마녀의 저주 때문에
　원래의 몸이 조각조각 나뉘고 말았다.
　머리, 귀, 손발, 몸통, 심장…….<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57801.zh-Hans:
<voice 01792_00057801><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我因为被某个魔女施加了诅咒，
原本的身体已经四分五裂了。
分成了头、耳朵、手脚、躯干、心脏……<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57801.zh-Hant:
<voice 01792_00057801><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我因為某個魔女的詛咒，
真正的身體被分散到各處。
頭、耳朵、手腳、身體、心臟……<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57802.en:
<voice 01912_00057802><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>And then... My split body turned into those monsters,
and started attacking Melsandy village.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57802.ja:
<voice 01912_00057802><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「そして……バラバラになった身体は
　化け物になって　メルサンディ村を
　襲いはじめたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57802.ko:
<voice 01912_00057802><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 그리고…… 조각난 몸은
　괴물로 변해 메르상디 마을을
　습격하기 시작했지.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57802.zh-Hans:
<voice 01912_00057802><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>那之后……我四分五裂的身体
变成了怪物，开始袭击
梅尔桑蒂村。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57802.zh-Hant:
<voice 01912_00057802><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>然後……四散的身體們
變成了怪物，開始襲擊
梅爾桑蒂村。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57803.en: <voice 01972_00057803><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>What you see now is just my tiny soul.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57803.ja:
<voice 01972_00057803><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「お前の目の前にいる　ささやかな俺は 
　何を隠そう　魂だけの存在なのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57803.ko:
<voice 01972_00057803><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 네 눈앞에 있는 작디작은 나는
　사실 영혼뿐인 존재다.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57803.zh-Hans:
<voice 01972_00057803><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>不瞒你说，现在站在你面前这个
小个子的我，是只剩灵魂的存在。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57803.zh-Hant:
<voice 01972_00057803><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>不瞞你說，在你面前這個小小的我，
是只剩下靈魂的存在。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57804.en:
<voice 02002_00057804><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Thanks to you, I could get my ears back. All that's
left is to get my heart back from that witch, and then I'll
be whole again.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57804.ja:
<voice 02002_00057804><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「おかげで　耳も回収できた。
　あとは　魔女が持つ　心臓さえ取り戻せば
　俺は　元の姿に戻れる。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57804.ko:
<voice 02002_00057804><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 덕분에 귀도 되찾았으니
　이제 마녀가 가진 심장만 되찾으면
　원래 모습으로 돌아갈 수 있겠군.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57804.zh-Hans:
<voice 02002_00057804><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>多亏了你，我找回了耳朵。
这之后我只要取回魔女手里的心脏，
就能变回原来的样子了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57804.zh-Hant:
<voice 02002_00057804><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>多虧了你，我收回了耳朵。
只要將剩下在魔女手上的心臟取回，
我就能恢復原本的模樣了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57805.en: <voice 02052_00057805><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>...I will save the village.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57805.ja: <voice 02052_00057805><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「……村を　救える。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57805.ko: <voice 02052_00057805><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: ……마을을 구할 수 있게 되는 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57805.zh-Hans: <voice 02052_00057805><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……也就能拯救村子了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57805.zh-Hant: <voice 02052_00057805><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……村子就能得救了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57806.en:
<voice 02102_00057806><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Everyone calls me a hero, but, at heart, I'm a sinful,
shameful person.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57806.ja:
<voice 02102_00057806><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「英雄なんて　呼ばれちゃいるが 
　本当のところ　俺は　そんな
　罪深くて　みっともねえモンなんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57806.ko:
<voice 02102_00057806><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 영웅이라 불리고 있기는 하지만
　사실 나는 죄가 많고
　보잘것없는 존재야.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57806.zh-Hans:
<voice 02102_00057806><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我虽然被叫作英雄，
但其实是一个罪孽深重，
不像样子的家伙。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57806.zh-Hant:
<voice 02102_00057806><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我雖然被稱作英雄，
但其實我只是個罪孽深重，
活得難看的傢伙而已。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57807.en: <voice 02142_00057807><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>...<cs_pchero>, thanks for helping me out.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57807.ja:
<voice 02142_00057807><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「……<cs_pchero>。
　チカラを貸してくれて　ありがとよ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57807.ko:
<voice 02142_00057807><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: ……<cs_pchero>.
　힘을 빌려줘서 고맙다.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57807.zh-Hans:
<voice 02142_00057807><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>。
谢谢你帮我。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57807.zh-Hant:
<voice 02142_00057807><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>，
感謝你的幫助。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000029.en:
<voice 02143_29000029><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>That hand monster and Zankrone's hand... I, once
again, could not foresee anything.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000029.ja:
<voice 02143_29000029><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「あの手のお化けが
　ザンクローネさんの手……。
　ぼくは　また　何も見えてなかった。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000029.ko:
<voice 02143_29000029><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 그 손 괴물이
　장크로네 씨의 손이었다니…….
　전 또 아무것도 보지 못했네요.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000029.zh-Hans:
<voice 02143_29000029><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>那只手形怪物
是赞库罗尼先生的手……
我又看不到未来了。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000029.zh-Hant:
<voice 02143_29000029><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>那隻手形怪物
是桑克朗先生的手……
我又看不到未來了。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000030.en: <voice 02144_29000030><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>WITCH!? Dismembered body parts!?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000030.ja: <voice 02144_29000030><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「魔女って！？　バラバラって！？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000030.ko: <voice 02144_29000030><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 마녀라니!? 조각조각 해체하다니!?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000030.zh-Hans: <voice 02144_29000030><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>魔女？！四分五裂？！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000030.zh-Hant: <voice 02144_29000030><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>魔女！？被大卸八塊！？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000031.en:
<voice 02145_29000031><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>The hero's body attacking the village it was supposed
to protect...?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000031.ja:
<voice 02145_29000031><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「英雄の身体が
　守るべき村を襲ってたのか……？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000031.ko:
<voice 02145_29000031><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 영웅의 몸이
　지켜야 할 마을을 공격했단 거야……?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000031.zh-Hans:
<voice 02145_29000031><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>英雄的身体
跑去攻击他应该保护的村庄……？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000031.zh-Hant:
<voice 02145_29000031><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>英雄的身體
跑去攻擊他應該保護的村莊……？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000032.en: <voice 02146_29000032><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>...Does the witch hold the key to all these mysteries?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000032.ja:
<voice 02146_29000032><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……魔女が
　全ての謎の鍵を　握ってる？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000032.ko:
<voice 02146_29000032><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ……마녀가
　모든 수수께끼의 열쇠를 쥐고 있는 건가?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000032.zh-Hans:
<voice 02146_29000032><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……是魔女
掌握着所有谜团的关键？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000032.zh-Hant:
<voice 02146_29000032><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……是魔女
掌握著所有謎團的關鍵？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000033.en:
<voice 02147_29000033><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>A dismembered Zankrone attacking the village...
The sad ending to the 'Tale of the Little Hero'...
The 4th sequel that she couldn't show anyone.<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000033.ja:
<voice 02147_29000033><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>「バラバラのザンクローネが村を襲う……。
　……『小さな英雄』の悲しい結末……。
　第４話を　読ませてもらわないと。<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000033.ko:
<voice 02147_29000033><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>: 조각난 장크로네가 마을을 공격한다…….
　……『작은 영웅』의 슬픈 결말…….
　4화를 읽어 봐야겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000033.zh-Hans:
<voice 02147_29000033><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>身体四分五裂的赞库罗尼袭击了村庄……
……“小英雄”的悲伤结局……
得去看第四回才行。<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000033.zh-Hant:
<voice 02147_29000033><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>身體四分五裂的桑克朗襲擊了村莊……
……「小英雄」的悲傷結局……
我得去看第４集才行。<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000034.en: <voice 02148_29000034><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>That has to be it. Let's go see Airi.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000034.ja:
<voice 02148_29000034><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「そうですね。
　アイリさんに　会いにいきましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000034.ko:
<voice 02148_29000034><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그러게.
　애일리 씨를 만나러 가자.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000034.zh-Hans:
<voice 02148_29000034><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>也对，
我们去找爱丽吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000034.zh-Hant:
<voice 02148_29000034><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>也對，
我們去找愛麗吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57808.en:
<voice 00050_00057808><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Welcome back, <pc>. I see that you helped out
Zankrone, didn't you.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57808.ja:
<voice 00050_00057808><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「おかえりなさい　<pc>さん。
　ザンクローネさんの　お願いを
　聞いてくださったんですね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57808.ko:
<voice 00050_00057808><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 어서 오세요, <pc> 씨.
　장크로네 씨의 부탁을
　들어주셨군요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57808.zh-Hans:
<voice 00050_00057808><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>你回来了，<pc>。
你去帮助赞库罗尼了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57808.zh-Hant:
<voice 00050_00057808><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>歡迎回來，<pc>。
看來你接受了桑克朗先生的請託。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57809.en:
<voice 00080_00057809><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>On behalf of the little hero, it's not much but as
thanks...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57809.ja:
<voice 00080_00057809><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「小さな英雄さんに　代わりまして
　心ばかりですが　お礼を……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57809.ko:
<voice 00080_00057809><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 작은 영웅님을 대신해서
　비록 마음뿐이지만 보답을……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57809.zh-Hans:
<voice 00080_00057809><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>这是我代替小英雄
送上的一点心意……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57809.zh-Hant:
<voice 00080_00057809><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我代替小英雄
送你這份謝禮……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57810.en: <voice 00160_00057810><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...I'm sorry. Could you come just a bit closer?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57810.ja:
<voice 00160_00057810><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……ごめんなさい。
　すこし　近くに来ていただけますか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57810.ko:
<voice 00160_00057810><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……죄송해요.
　조금 가까이 와 주시겠어요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57810.zh-Hans:
<voice 00160_00057810><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……对不起。
你能再靠近点吗？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57810.zh-Hant:
<voice 00160_00057810><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……對不起，
你能靠近一點嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

57811.en:
<voice 00373_00057811><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>So then, did Zankrone figure out how to get back to
his original world?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57811.ja:
<voice 00373_00057811><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「それで　ザンクローネさんが
　元の世界に戻る方法は　わかりましたか？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57811.ko:
<voice 00373_00057811><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 그런데 장크로네 씨가
　원래 세계로 돌아갈 방법은 알아내셨나요?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57811.zh-Hans:
<voice 00373_00057811><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>那之后，找到让赞库罗尼
回到原来世界的方法了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57811.zh-Hant:
<voice 00373_00057811><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>然後呢？桑克朗先生
知道回原本世界的方法了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57812.en:
<voice 00483_00057812><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh my!! You say a witch will appear and destroy the
village? That's...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57812.ja:
<voice 00483_00057812><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「まあ！！　魔女が現れて
　メルサンディ村が　滅んでしまうですって？
　それって……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57812.ko:
<voice 00483_00057812><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 세상에!! 마녀가 나타나서
　메르상디 마을이 멸망할 거라니요?
　그건……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57812.zh-Hans:
<voice 00483_00057812><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>啊！魔女就要出现了，
梅尔桑蒂村将会毁灭？
这种事……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57812.zh-Hant:
<voice 00483_00057812><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>什麼！！你說魔女出現了，
還要摧毀梅爾桑蒂村？
也就是……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57813.ja: <voice 00533_00057813><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「ゴホッ！　ゴホ　ゴホッ！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57813.ko: <voice 00533_00057813><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 콜록! 콜록콜록!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57813.zh-Hant: <voice 00533_00057813><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>咳咳！咳、咳！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57814.en:
<voice 00593_00057814><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I was rereading "The Tale of Little Hero Zankrone",
part 4 that Grandfather had left.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57814.ja:
<voice 00593_00057814><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私　おじいさまの遺した
　『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』　４話を
　読み返していたんです。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57814.ko:
<voice 00593_00057814><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 전 할아버님이 남기신
　『작은 영웅 장크로네 이야기』 4화를
　다시 읽어 보고 있었답니다.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57814.zh-Hans:
<voice 00593_00057814><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我又读了一遍爷爷留下的
《小英雄赞库罗尼的故事》第四回。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57814.zh-Hant:
<voice 00593_00057814><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我重新讀了爺爺留下來的
《小英雄桑克朗的故事》第４集。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57815.en:
<voice 00703_00057815><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>The bad rabbits came out of the well and said,
"Soon, the witch will appear from the depths of
darkness!"<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57815.ja:
<voice 00703_00057815><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「井戸から出てきた　悪いウサギは　言いました。
　まもなく　闇の底より　魔女様が現れる！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57815.ko:
<voice 00703_00057815><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 우물에서 나온 못된 토끼는 말했어요.
　곧 어둠 속에서 마녀님이 나타날 것이다!<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57815.zh-Hans:
<voice 00703_00057815><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>从井里出来的坏兔子说过，
不久之后魔女大人就会自黑暗的深渊出现！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57815.zh-Hant:
<voice 00703_00057815><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>從井裡冒出來的壞兔子們說過，
魔女很快就會從黑暗的深淵現身！<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57816.en:
<voice 00733_00057816><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>"The witch will bring forth eternal night and ruin
to Melsandy Village."<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57816.ja:
<voice 00733_00057816><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「魔女様は　メルサンディ村に
　永遠の夜をもたらし　滅ぼすだろう。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57816.ko:
<voice 00733_00057816><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 마녀님은 메르상디 마을에
　영원한 밤을 가져와 멸망시킬 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57816.zh-Hans:
<voice 00733_00057816><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>魔女大人将会给梅尔桑蒂村
带来永远的黑夜，并毁灭村子。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57816.zh-Hant:
<voice 00733_00057816><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>魔女大人會讓永遠的黑夜
降臨梅爾桑蒂村，並毀了村子。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57817.en:
<voice 00813_00057817><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...That's the same thing the rabbits were talking about,
wasn't it?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57817.ja:
<voice 00813_00057817><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……これって　ウサギさんが
　言い残したことと　同じですよね。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57817.ko:
<voice 00813_00057817><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……이건 토끼님이
　남긴 말과 똑같죠.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57817.zh-Hans:
<voice 00813_00057817><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……这不是和兔子先生
死之前说的话一样么。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57817.zh-Hant:
<voice 00813_00057817><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……跟兔子先生牠們
說的一樣呢。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57818.en:
<voice 00843_00057818><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I have a bad feeling. I feel that what's written in the
fairy tales will end up coming true...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57818.ja:
<voice 00843_00057818><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「私　イヤな予感がします。
　この童話に　描かれていることが
　本当になっちゃう気がして……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57818.ko:
<voice 00843_00057818><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 전 불길한 예감이 들어요.
　이 동화에 그려진 일이
　실제로 일어날 것만 같아서…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57818.zh-Hans:
<voice 00843_00057818><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我有不好的预感。
这个童话里写的事，
都会成真……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57818.zh-Hant:
<voice 00843_00057818><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>我有不好的預感。
童話裡的故事
也許會變成現實……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57819.en:
<voice 00883_00057819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>But I don't have the strength to protect the village...
I can hardly protect myself.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57819.ja:
<voice 00883_00057819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「でも　私には　村を守るチカラはありません。 
　自分の身を守ることすら　できないんですもの。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57819.ko:
<voice 00883_00057819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 하지만 제게는 마을을 지킬 힘이 없어요.
　제 몸 하나 지키는 일조차 할 수 없는걸요.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57819.zh-Hans:
<voice 00883_00057819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>但是我并没有保护村子的力量。
我就连保护自己也做不到。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57819.zh-Hant:
<voice 00883_00057819><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>但是我沒有能夠保護村子的力量。 
我連保護自己都有困難了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57820.en: <voice 00923_00057820><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>...I don't have much longer to live.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57820.ja: <voice 00923_00057820><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「……私　あまり長くは　生きられないんです。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57820.ko: <voice 00923_00057820><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: ……전 그리 오래 살지는 못한답니다.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57820.zh-Hans: <voice 00923_00057820><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……我应该活不久了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57820.zh-Hant: <voice 00923_00057820><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>……我應該活不久了。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57821.en:
<voice 00953_00057821><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Before my life runs out, I'd like to at least... Save
everyone in the village who have been so good to me...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57821.ja:
<voice 00953_00057821><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「この命が　尽きる前に
　せめて……よくしてくださった
　村の皆さんを　救えたら……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57821.ko:
<voice 00953_00057821><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 이 목숨이 다하기 전에
　적어도…… 저에게 잘해 주신
　마을 주민분들을 구할 수 있다면…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57821.zh-Hans:
<voice 00953_00057821><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>在我死之前，
至少……我想救救
善待过我的村民们……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57821.zh-Hant:
<voice 00953_00057821><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>在我的生命結束以前，
至少我想救
一直對我很好的村民們……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000035.en: <voice 00954_29000035><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>"Bring forth eternal night and ruin to the village"...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000035.ja: <voice 00954_29000035><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「永遠の夜をもたらし　村を滅ぼす……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000035.ko: <voice 00954_29000035><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 영원한 밤을 가져와 마을을 멸망시킨다…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000035.zh-Hans: <voice 00954_29000035><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>带来永远的黑夜，毁灭村子……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000035.zh-Hant: <voice 00954_29000035><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>帶來永遠的黑夜，毀滅村子……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000036.en: <voice 00955_29000036><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>What does it mean?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000036.ja: <voice 00955_29000036><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「どういう意味だ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000036.ko: <voice 00955_29000036><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 무슨 뜻이지?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000036.zh-Hans: <voice 00955_29000036><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>什么意思？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000036.zh-Hant: <voice 00955_29000036><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>什麼意思？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000037.en:
<voice 00956_29000037><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>The false and true worlds seem to be deeply connected
after all. As it is, this village will be...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000037.ja:
<voice 00956_29000037><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「偽の世界と　真の世界
　やっぱり　深く　つながってるようね。
　このままでは　この村も……。　<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000037.ko:

<voice 00956_29000037><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>虚假世界和真实世界

29000038.en: <voice 00957_29000038><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>Either way, we must locate that witch.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000038.ja: <voice 00957_29000038><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「やはり　魔女を探さないと。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000038.ko: <voice 00957_29000038><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 역시 마녀를 찾아야겠어요.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000038.zh-Hans: <voice 00957_29000038><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>还是必须去找魔女才行。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000038.zh-Hant: <voice 00957_29000038><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>果然必須去找魔女才行。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57822.en:
<voice 01013_00057822><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Ugh... *cough* I'm sorry. I think I need to rest
a little...<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57822.ja:
<voice 01013_00057822><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>「うっ……ゴホッ。
　ごめんなさい　すこしだけ
　休ませていただけますか……。<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57822.ko:
<voice 01013_00057822><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>: 윽…… 콜록.

　좀 쉴게요…….<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01013_00057822><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>呜……咳。
对不起，让我
休息一下吧……<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

不好意思，

29000039.en:
<voice 01014_29000039><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Oh, sorry for suddenly barging in. Rest assured. We'll
deal with the witch somehow.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01014_29000039><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「あ　ゴメンなさい。いきなり押しかけて。

　魔女は　私たちが　なんとかする。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000039.ko:
<voice 01014_29000039><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 아, 미안해. 갑자기 찾아와서.
　걱정 말고 푹 쉬어.
　마녀는 우리가 해결할 테니까.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000039.zh-Hans:
<voice 01014_29000039><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>啊，真抱歉，突然就这么跑来。
你放心继续休息吧，
魔女的事我们会想办法解决的。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000039.zh-Hant:

你放心繼續休息吧，
魔女的事我們會想辦法解決的。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000040.en: <voice 01015_29000040><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I told you already... Don't say such faint-hearted things.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
